com.palantir.giraffe.command

Class CommandContext.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.palantir.giraffe.command.CommandContext.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    CommandContext

    public static final class CommandContext.Builder
extends Object
    Builds CommandContext objects.

    • Method Detail

      • environment

        public CommandContext.Builder environment(CommandEnvironment environment)
        Sets the environment for commands executed with this context.
        Parameters:
        environment - the environment
        Returns:
        this builder

      • requireExitStatus

        public CommandContext.Builder requireExitStatus(int status)
        Sets the required exit status for commands executed with this context. If the command exits with a different exit status, a CommandException is thrown.

        By default, an exit status of 0 is required.

        Parameters:
        status - the required exit status
        Returns:
        this builder

      • ignoreExitStatus

        public CommandContext.Builder ignoreExitStatus()
        Allows any exit status for commands executed with this context. When this is set, CommandException is never thrown.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • requireExitStatus

        public CommandContext.Builder requireExitStatus(Predicate<Integer> exitStatusVerifier)
        Indicates what the permissible exit status of a command execution is through a Predicate. If the Predicate returns true, that is implied to mean that the exit status is permissible.
        Parameters:
        exitStatusVerifier - The Predicate used to verify the exit status
        Returns:
        this builder

      • workingDirectory

        public CommandContext.Builder workingDirectory(UniformPath path)
        Sets the working directory for commands executed with this context.
        Parameters:
        path - the working directory path
        Returns:
        this builder

      • workingDirectory

        public CommandContext.Builder workingDirectory(Path path)
        Sets the working directory for commands executed with this context.

        This method is equivalent to calling workingDirectory(UniformPath) after converting the path to a UniformPath.

        Parameters:
        path - the working directory path
        Returns:
        this builder
        See Also:
        UniformPath.fromPath(Path)

      • discardOutput

        public CommandContext.Builder discardOutput()
        Discards all output from commands. Equivalent to outputWindowSizes(0, 0).
        Returns:
        this builder

      • outputWindowSizes

        public CommandContext.Builder outputWindowSizes(int stdoutWindow,
                                       int stderrWindow)
        Sets the window sizes for the process output streams.

        The size of the window determines the amount of recent output buffered for reading. If data is written beyond the window size without corresponding reads, data older than the window is discarded. A window size of 0 discards all data.

        By default, there is no window and buffering is limited by the maximum size of the buffer array (effectively a window of size Integer.MAX_VALUE).

        Parameters:
        stdoutWindow - the window for the output stream
        stderrWindow - the window for the error stream
        Returns:
        this builder

      • build

        public CommandContext build()
        Creates a new CommandContext using the settings configured by this builder. The builder may be reused to create more contexts after calling this method.
